648080.name: Beans: The Coffee Shop Simulator - OST
648080.description:
Complete your Beans experience with the full original soundtrack for Beans: The Coffee Shop Simulator.

This album contains 38 original tracks of chiptune-jazz as well as some more upbeat video-game inspired chiptune boss themes.
The album spans levels, which also span genres of jazz inspiration.

The files are provided in both MP3 and OGG format.
